text: And the men did the work faithfully: and the overseers of them were Jahath and Obadiah, the Levites, of the sons of Merari; and Zechariah and Meshullam, of the sons of the Kohathites, to set it forward; and <FI>others of<Fi> the Levites, all that were skilful with instruments of music.
name: II Chronicles 34:12
